txt.en: Anything you add to the Sounds filtered list will no longer play as audio in your game client. To filter a sound, position your character in a place or situation where you hear the sound. Click the record button to see a list of all sounds currently playing. This list will keep updating until you click stop or close the UI. You can play any sound from any list by right-clicking or double-clicking it. Drag any sound from the recently heard list to the character or account filtered list to filter the sound.
